description: This file contains functions for verifying Google OAuth ID tokens, extracting user profile information from claims, and creating or retrieving User objects from the database based on Google profile data. It acts as a service layer to handle Google OAuth integration in the application.

classes.name: User
classes.description: ORM model class representing users in the database.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] verify_google_id_token(id_token: str, audience: str)
methods.description: Verifies a Google ID token and returns its claims if valid.

methods.name: Tuple[str,bool,str|None,str|None] _extract_profile(claims: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Extracts email, verification status, name, and avatar URL from Google claims.

methods.name: User get_or_create_user_from_google(db: Session, claims: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Finds or creates a User based on Google ID token claims, updating profile info if necessary.

ctags.name: _extract_profile
ctags.pattern: /^def _extract_profile(claims: Dict[str, Any]) -> Tuple[str, bool, str | None, str | None]:$/

ctags.name: get_or_create_user_from_google
ctags.pattern: /^def get_or_create_user_from_google(db: Session, claims: Dict[str, Any]) -> User:$/

ctags.name: verify_google_id_token
ctags.pattern: /^def verify_google_id_token(id_token: str, audience: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
